DarkMouse::

She snored loudly in her hole in the ground. She had dug deep inside 
the earth. And there she had remained all this time.  Her santuary 
away from the war. After the fight with a rattlesnake that nearly 
cost her her life, and the death of her beloved leader, she needed to 
find a place to rest. Away from the war that had been brewing up on 
the surface. Now, she lay curled up in her den, under the ground. 
Sound asleep and snoozing peacefully.  Her whiskers twitched and her 
head nudged against her paw.  She slowly opened her eyes and yawned.  
"Ooohhhhh, ouch." she groaned softly to herself. "Nothing like waking 
up to cramps after a long nap." Her body felt stiff from such a long 
period of time without activity.  She was in mouse mode and stretched 
her small body, trying to get out the kinks. The only light in her 
den was the light coming from her own optics. But being a mouse, she 
could see in near pitch black.  "Oh my," she said as she put her paw 
to her belly,"I guess I need something to eat."  She checked her  
small energon compartment. It was empty. She sighed heavily.  "Well, 
if I'm out of food, I have to go forage. But that means," she 
swallowed hard," I have to go up onto the surface." She looked down 
and shook her head. "Well, I knew I would have to go up sooner or 
later. Well, here's nothing."  She started dig her way towards the 
surface.  She broke ground and saw the sun. She had to cover her eyes 
as the bright light shined down on her.  She crawled up and 
transformed into bot mode. She dusted herself off and looked around. 
"Whoah!"  She looked around and saw that things had changed since she 
went into hybernation.  She wondered how much things has changed 
since she left.  When she started her her slumber, she had burried 
herself a few miles south of the base that KitKat had been leader in. 
Now, things have changed.  She needed to see what was out there. She 
started walking to the old base to see what she would find.  She 
walked in bot mode, but kept out of sight, just in case things 
weren't going well for the preds. 

OOC: OK, I need help, like an update on what's new here folks. I'm 
back for a while. So, I could use some help here. Oh, I'm only 
playing DarkMouse. So those who have my other chars need to still 
keep them. Sorry, but with my limited time on line, I can only work 
one char at the moment. Sorry about that.
